casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jonathan Douglas RICHARDSON. No. 272A14-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Feb. 5, 2016. Paul M. Green, Durham, for Richardson, Jonathan Douglas. David Weiss, Durham, for Richardson, Jonathan Douglas. Gregory Butler, Assistant District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Paul Jackson, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of February 2016 by Defendant for Extension of Time to Prepare Trial Transcript:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of February 2016."
